=API for walk=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.walk))
}}}

===(_postwalk_ f form)===
<pre> Performs a depth-first, post-order traversal of form.  Calls f on
each sub-form, uses f's return value in place of the original.
Recognizes all Clojure data structures except sorted-map-by.
Consumes seqs as with doall.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#52 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]postwalk([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_postwalk-demo_ form)===
<pre> Demonstrates the behavior of postwalk by printing each form as it is
walked.  Returns form.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#78 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]postwalk-demo([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_postwalk-replace_ smap form)===
<pre> Recursively transforms form by replacing keys in smap with their
values.  Like clojure/replace but works on any data structure.  Does
replacement at the leaves of the tree first.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#111 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]postwalk-replace([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----

===(_prewalk-replace_ smap form)===
<pre> Recursively transforms form by replacing keys in smap with their
values.  Like clojure/replace but works on any data structure.  Does
replacement at the root of the tree first.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#104 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]prewalk-replace([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_stringify-keys_ m)===
<pre> Recursively transforms all map keys from keywords to strings.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/walk.clj#97 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]stringify-keys([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_walk_ inner outer form)===
<pre> Traverses form, an arbitrary data structure.  inner and outer are
functions.  Applies inner to each element of form, building up a
data structure of the same type, then applies outer to the result.
Recognizes all Clojure data structures except sorted-map-by.
Consumes seqs as with doall.</pre>
